body.p: This element should appear directly inside a template.XULElem("rule") element and is used to define conditions for the rule. Within the conditions can be placed template.XULElem("content"), template.XULElem("member") and template.XULElem("triple") elements. These may have attributes whose value is a variable name beginning with a question mark (?). When evaluating the rule for a particular RDF resource, the variables are replaced with values from the resource. If all variables can be replaced, the rule matched.
This element is used with Firefox 2/Mozilla 1.8 and earlier instead of the template.XULElem("query") element.
More information is available in the XUL tutorial.
